name: Real Driving City Sim
description:
Real Driving City Sim is classic & realistic simulation game. Get ready to test your driving skills, and become the licensed real car driver. Avoid signal violation and do not car damage by crashing with other road vehicles. Drive & park carefully otherwise you’ll not be given any license. With each level up, the difficulty level of car parking increases. So be patient and learn parking & driving from real parking school with gear attentively. The gameplay gives you enough flexibility and realistic simulation car controls like gear and steering, that makes the game attractive to play. Don’t hit with road barricades, cones & hurdles as its all included in traffic laws violations. And it will make impossible for you to park and drive. The more will be the risk, more will be the fun!! Fasten your seat belt and Go drive and park.

Features:
- Realistic graphics
- Realistic car driving
- Realistic car physics & damage system
- Auto braking system
- Follow checkpoints
- 3D Maps
- Real engine sounds
- Tilt steering and button controls
